医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
心理社会干预显示出治疗非生理性更年期症状的希望伦敦大学学院研究人员的一项新研究发现，正念和认知行为疗法（CBT）等干预措施可能是治疗更年期相关情绪症状、记忆力和注意力问题的有效选择。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Psychosocial-interventions-show-promise-for-managing-non-physical-menopausal-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Psychosocial-interventions-show-promise-for-managing-non-physical-menopausal-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c29b6a27-589a-4691-94aa-faa0147967ae Tue, 27 Feb 2024 23:00:54 -0500 Psychosocial interventions show promise for managing non-physiological menopausal symptoms
SickKids 的科学家为早期发现心肌病奠定了基础在第一项使用全基因组测序来检查心脏病中串联重复扩增的研究中，病童医院 (SickKids) 的科学家为心肌病的早期检测和未来的精准治疗奠定了基础。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/SickKids-scientists-lay-the-groundwork-for-early-detection-of-cardiomyopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/SickKids-scientists-lay-the-groundwork-for-early-detection-of-cardiomyopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54a4c9d4-4ad6-4b8b-aa8e-22eef5c70e8d Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:49:13 -0500 SickKids scientists lay the groundwork for early detection of cardiomyopathy
研究发现，慢性水分不足与重大健康风险有关慢性缺水与严重的长期健康问题有关，包括心脏病、糖尿病和肾功能障碍，这凸显了提高补水意识和干预策略的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Chronic-underHydration-linked-to-major-health-risks-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Chronic-underHydration-linked-to-major-health-risks-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bb0ea168-c716-4f5d-86e8-7f87b8650dae Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:32:00 -0500 Chronic underhydration linked to major health risks, study finds
鼻窦炎与风湿病风险升高有关发表在开放获取期刊 RMD Open 上的研究发现，常见的炎症性疾病鼻窦炎与随后诊断为风湿病的风险增加 40% 相关，尤其是在症状出现前的 5 至 10 年内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Sinusitis-tied-to-elevated-rheumatic-disease-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Sinusitis-tied-to-elevated-rheumatic-disease-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fb0ca1a-32eb-4087-8f60-8551428c492d Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:22:00 -0500 Sinusitis tied to elevated rheumatic disease risk
确定了儿童神经母细胞瘤的通用、重要的生物标志物研究人员新发现了儿童癌症神经母细胞瘤的一种通用的、重要的生物标志物，以及一个潜在的新治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Universal-essential-biomarker-identified-for-childhood-neuroblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Universal-essential-biomarker-identified-for-childhood-neuroblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b0041f9-9337-439f-a89c-474258f5edaf Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:15:23 -0500 Universal, essential biomarker identified for childhood neuroblastoma
科学家发现 SARS-CoV-2 进入人体细胞的新途径研究确定人转铁蛋白受体是 SARS-CoV-2 感染的替代途径，为 COVID-19 治疗提供了潜在的新靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Scientists-uncover-a-new-doorway-for-SARS-CoV-2-into- human-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Scientists-uncover-a-new-doorway-for-SARS-CoV-2-into- human-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=24cbc161-134f-4ac2-bd06-33a1745f9682 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:11:00 -0500 Scientists uncover a new doorway for SARS-CoV-2 into human cells
眼球运动反射揭示了自闭症的遗传关联加州大学旧金山分校的科学家可能发现了一种测试自闭症的新方法，通过测量儿童转头时眼睛的移动方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Eye-movement-reflex-reveals-genic-association-with-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Eye-movement-reflex-reveals-genic-association-with-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d14c7de-bd45-408b-a7f7-8b2287b8899b Tue, 27 Feb 2024 22:10:56 -0500 Eye movement reflex reveals genetic association with autism
抗性淀粉饮食被证明可以改变减肥和糖尿病控制的游戏规则根据《自然代谢》最近的一项研究，补充抗性淀粉可以通过改变肠道微生物组和增加次级胆汁酸来减轻体重并提高胰岛素敏感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Resistant-starch-diet-proves-a-game-changer-for-weight-loss-and-diabetes-control.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Resistant-starch-diet-proves-a-game-changer-for-weight-loss-and-diabetes-control.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8d9092c-df2f-4935-90e7-3e0d1da2502f Tue, 27 Feb 2024 21:53:00 -0500 Resistant starch diet proves a game changer for weight loss and diabetes control
利用人工智能预防传染病将于今年欧洲临床微生物学和传染病大会 (ECCMID 2024) 会前一天发布的一项新研究综述将着眼于人工智能帮助预防传染病爆发的多种方式，包括确保工作人员正确佩戴个人防护装备管理日常医院活动，例如药物处方和清洁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Harnessing-artificial-intelligence-for-infectious-disease-prevention.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Harnessing-artificial-intelligence-for-infectious-disease-prevention.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=02cdc1ee-3877-4719-9313-e09f7418aaa3 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 21:49:34 -0500 Harnessing artificial intelligence for infectious disease prevention
落基山脉和大平原农业中农药的使用与帕金森病有关根据今天（2024 年 2 月 27 日）发布的一项初步研究，农业中使用的杀虫剂和除草剂与美国落基山脉和大平原地区的帕金森病有关，该研究将在美国神经病学学会第 76 届年会上发表将于 2024 年 4 月 13 日至 18 日在丹佛现场和在线举行。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Pesticide-use-in-farming-linked-to-Parkinsons-disease-in-the-Rocky-Mountain-and-Great-Plains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240227/Pesticide-use-in-farming-linked-to-Parkinsons-disease-in-the-Rocky-Mountain-and-Great-Plains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd2c773c-61d2-4505-82f6-73f9d3b211c6 Tue, 27 Feb 2024 21:43:31 -0500 Pesticide use in farming linked to Parkinson's disease in the Rocky Mountain and Great Plains
